name: TopDownTanks
description:
A simple top-down wave based shooter with TANKS! Test your bullet dodging skills with tank controls. Mouse and keyboard required to play! Playing in full screen is recommended.
Controls:

  • WASD to move, tank controls
  • Mouse to aim
  • Right and left click to shoot
  • Escape to Pause

Notes and Credits:

  • Everything done by me (earthmrskull) other than two external assets:
    • ECM2 as a base for the player controller
    • ProPixelizer for the pixel shader
  • 2 Weeks+ of development time, approx 2 hours each day.
  • 3 Enemies, regular tank, large tank, and the bomber
